transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Please tell me.
Customer: Uh, yes sir, Avni baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Yesterday we have talked in the evening.
Customer: No sir, not at all.
Executive: Please tell me what you want.
Customer: Uh, I am from IndiaMART your account manager.
Customer: Okay, okay, thank you.
Customer: In the evening
Customer: I am enquiring in IndiaMART about silver extraction machines companies.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Now till I am not receiving any reply from them.
Executive: Okay, you can call them, we may be consumed your lead.
Customer: No, no, I am not calling anyone.
Executive: Why?
Customer: I also send message to IndiaMART.
Executive: No sir, but you have to call your buyers because if you will not call then other company will call them and convert them.
Customer: No, no company can contact me now itself. By messages I want message please give me messages I am I tell to that person.
Executive: Sir, it will not work like that if you will not approach to company.
Customer: No, not at all. you will no one give me message.
Customer: Okay, thank you madam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received replies from companies.

Resolution:

- Executive suggested calling the companies.

- Executive explained the importance of calling buyers.

Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, indiaMART
